name: Escape from Dim Co.
description:
The illuminating adventures of Lost and Found. Help Lost and Found escape from the DimCo's dimming facility while evading the DimCo sentries and seeking out the Neon-splattered shards of the facility key to free themselves from the clutches of DimCo.

Controls :

Lost - WASD

Found - Arrow Keys

or  L & R analogue sticks ( Lost - L, Found - R )

You must help Found guide Lost through the level, Lost must avoid the sentries while Found can absorb them. Navigate Lost and Found together collecting the key shards to unlock the neon padlock to escape the evil DimCo.

Made for Global Game Jam 2021

By The Peoples Republic of Manywhere;

Forrest Pando (@forrestpando) ------- Lighting Artist / Co-Producer

Jordan Cordina (@jordancordina) ---- Level Designer / Co-Producer
